sentences.en: At the door was a neatly dressed, dignified man.
sentences.cn: 门口站着一位穿戴整齐、仪态庄重的男子。

sentences.en: He always strikes such a dignified pose before his girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 他总是在女友面前摆出这种庄严的姿态.

sentences.en: He is trying to project a more dignified, statesmanlike image in this election year.
sentences.cn: 他正试图在这个选举年中树立一种更加威严、更有政治家风范的形象。

sentences.en: He liked a hushed and dignified atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢一种寂静庄重的气氛。

sentences.en: He preserved his grave and dignified bearing.
sentences.cn: 他保持庄重威严的仪态.

sentences.en: He seemed a very dignified and charming man.
sentences.cn: 他看上去很高贵，富有魅力。

sentences.en: I was determined to take the news in a calm and dignified manner.
sentences.cn: 我决定要沉着冷静地面对这一消息。

sentences.en: It was a technique later dignified by the term "info-tainment".
sentences.cn: 那种技术后来被美其名曰“资讯娱乐”。

sentences.en: Mr Smith is maintaining a dignified silence.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生庄重地保持着沉默。

sentences.en: Oliver envied the fine person and dignified manners of his untutored brother.
sentences.cn: 奥利佛非常妒忌他这个没受过教育的弟弟长得竟这么好,举止又落落大方.

sentences.en: The gatepost was dignified by the weathered brass plate of Dr Harcourt Sibley.
sentences.cn: 在那块刻有哈考特·西布利医生姓名的久经风雨的黄铜牌映衬下，门柱更增添了几分庄重。

sentences.en: The uniform imparts a dignified appearance to him.
sentences.cn: 这身制服使他显得威严.

sentences.en: Throughout his trial he maintained a dignified silence.
sentences.cn: 在整个审讯过程中，他始终沉默以保持尊严。

sentences.en: Tu Wei - yueh said unhurriedly, as cool and dignified as ever.
sentences.cn: 屠维岳 放慢了声音说,却是那态度非常大方, 非常坦白,同时又非常镇静.

words.tran_cn: 使高贵；增威严；授以荣誉

trans.tran_cn: 有尊严的，庄严的，高贵的，厚重
trans.tran_en: behaving in a calm and serious way, even in a difficult situation, which makes people respect you
